## Discord Hangman Bot
* Developed a Discord bot that allows concurrent non-preemptive single player games of hangman on a Discord server.
* Incorporated Discord.py wrapper & constructed a custom game state class for the game's management.

## Tic-Tac-Toe iOS App
* Developed a Tic-Tac-Toe iOS application that allows users to play against an unbeatable AI.
* Incorporated C++, Objective-C,  and Swift to allow multi-language interaction and to design and implement an intuitive user interface and to reduce runtime by over 80%.
